description: You find yourself on a strange subway train with walls that seem to breathe and seats that whisper your name. The lights flicker between purple and green.

options.text: Stay seated and pretend to sleep
Approach the conductor with too many eyes
Hide behind the breathing wall

description: You emerge directly into a crystalline city where buildings grow like living crystal and the sky is an ocean of liquid light. Lizard people in business suits hurry past you.

options.text: Follow the lizard people to understand their society
Explore the crystal buildings alone
Look for other humans in the city

description: You awaken in the reality-warping Depths where gravity flows sideways and your thoughts echo as visible colors in the air.

options.text: Follow your colorful thoughts to their source
Try to find a way back to normal reality
Embrace the chaos and let it transform you

description: The conductor passes by, leaving a trail of silver dust. Your Glowing Scale pulses gently in your pocket.

options.text: Exit when the train stops at Crystal City
Use the Glowing Scale to see visions
Continue riding to see where the train goes

item_triggers.message: The Glowing Scale reveals visions of lizard people ruling a crystalline kingdom!

description: The conductor whispers riddles in ancient tongues. He stamps your hand with a mark that glows briefly.

options.text: Thank him and sit back down
Ask where the train is going

description: The wall shivers, revealing a secret panel. Inside is a small crystal sphere humming with power.

options.text: Take the sphere and rejoin the car
Climb through the panel

description: You watch as the lizards vote in a council meeting using thought projections. A clerk notices you.

options.text: Introduce yourself
Run before they see too much

description: Inside the buildings, you find light-powered elevators and memory archives encoded in glowing tiles.

options.text: Use your Crystal Shard on an archive
Leave and find other humans

description: You find graffiti: 'WE ESCAPED. FIND THE FRACTURE.' A strange pulse guides you toward the subway again.

options.text: Follow the pulse to the depths
Ignore it and try blending into the lizard society

description: Your thoughts lead to a mirror that reflects you as a lizard-hybrid. It offers you a forked staff.

options.text: Take the staff and continue
Smash the mirror and flee

description: You find a rusted subway map etched into stone. One stop reads: 'Home (through Fracture)'.

options.text: Search for the Fracture
Give up and lie down

description: You step into the city again, your mind sharper than before. Something calls you deeper.

options.text: Search for other humans
Explore more crystal structures

description: Visions flood your mind: an underground fractal tear in reality connecting all worlds.

options.text: Follow the vision to the Fracture
Collapse in awe

description: The train takes you beyond maps. The car empties. A door opens to endless stars and singing data.

options.text: Walk into the void
Jump off at the last visible station

description: You dissolve your sense of self. The Chaos Fragment pulses as your body flickers like static.

options.text: Let go completely and become part of the Depths
Use the Chaos Fragment to reshape your surroundings

description: You stand at the intersection of crystal logic and chaotic thought. Vision and Chaos fragments hum.

options.text: Combine the fragments and step through
Hesitate and turn back

description: You wander deeper into the Depths, surrendering your memories. You become a whisper in the void.
Using the Vision and Chaos Fragments, you rip a hole back to NYC. But something followed you out.
